name: Hololive Horror
description:
The gremlins are on the loose and the time machine is out of energy! Collect magnifying glasses around the map in order to recharge the time machine and escape!

A lot of what you see in game was made by me, but some of the assets I used can be found below:

  • Ame art from https://twitter.com/walfieee
  • Ambient music from GWriterStudio
  • Pixim font front 1001freefonts.com
  • Sound effects from zapsplat.com
  • Ame background music: https://dova-s.jp/bgm/play12459.html
  • A few other props and textures can be found on the unity asset store
